abstracts.cdata!:
This is an environmental assessment for
            the Power Sector Rehabilitation and Restructuring Project
            for Albania. It describes negative environmental impacts and
            their mitigation. Polychlorinated biphenyls (PCBs), though
            not prohibited by law, will be controlled according to
            international standards. Noise will be reduced by site
            selection, limited to work hours, and monitored by a noise
            meter. Dust will be reduced by sprinkling water. No
            pesticides will be used. Electrical fields will be monitored
            using an electric meter, and project design and construction
            will conform to international standards to reduce any
            negative impacts caused by the electrical field.
